transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, Sakon?
Executive: Ha, good evening sir, Sujit baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye boliye, alag number se baat kiya call kiya.
Executive: Nahi nahi alag number nahi hai sir, ye recorded line se call jati hai na. To official number aata hai, fir tumhari yaha pe call record ho rahi hai aur jab mai aapko personal call karta hu to wo mere number se jata hai jo aapne save kar rakha hai, hai na?
Customer: Okay okay okay. Ha ha to aap ye baarik zoom nahi kar rahe ho sir, services ki products ki aapke sare add on kara diye hai.
Customer: Kam se kam consume to kar sakte ho sir, baarik.
Customer: Ha actually actually me wo hua hai wo maine bola na wo startup pe kaam kar raha hu to abhi time hi nahi mil raha hai matlab din me aur phone call bhi mere ko jyada hi chal rahe hai. To IndiaMART upar se matlab mere ko IndiaMART bhi khola nahi hai abhi maine jab se hamari baat hui na tab se aath din tak aisa hua hai problem.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi issue nahi mai samajh sakta hu do char kaam bhi aur aap start kar rahe ho to uska timing ka flexibility aapke paas koi problem nahi hai. But thoda sa isme aapko jyada time nahi mangta, hafte me ek do din active ho jaiye. Baarik zoom kar lijiye to aap current bhi kar paoge, profile bhi active rahegi aur direct calls bhi aapke paas aayengi na aapke paas.
Customer: To ek kaam kijiye na, ek kaam karte hai hum koi particular matlab kal hum baat karte hai, theek hai 10 baje ke baad aur jo lead consume karni hai, theek hai to hum aisa karte hai thode din ke liye, thode din ke liye matlab ki agar aapko koi problem na ho to paanch se 10 din tak hum aisa karte hai ki aap waha se aur mai yaha se to aap mujhe introduction dete raho aur waise waise mai consume karta rahu alag alag jo mujhe inquiry jo hoti hai na, theek hai wo bhi mai search karke khud b khud to dekh lete hai fir market me meri jo product hai uske kahan pe maang hai wo aapne waise hi sikhaya tha na matlab Gujarat ke andar kahan pe hai aur kaun si lead aayi hui hai khud se dekhna hai to hum wo sath me kar lete hai to usse kya hoga ki jab tak hum phone pe baat karenge tab tak wo laptop pe aur IndiaMART ke andar jo time mujhe dena hai na wo bhi ho jayega aur sath sath me lead bhi consume ho jayegi aur mujhe thoda bahut janna hai wo bhi jankari mil jayegi aur kya hai matlab aur bhi kaam ho sakta hai to hum 10 15 minute waise baat karenge aur wo kaam sath me karenge to kya hai ki mera focus mere startup pe nahi aur IndiaMART pe hi rahega wo 15 20 minute tak aur usme hamara kaam thoda bahut ho jayega aur mujhe aadat bhi lag jayegi fir, chalega itna?
Executive: Theek hai koi problem nahi hai sir mujhe, aap jab bhi comfortable ho connect kar sakte ho. Ek fir aap mujhe time bhi doge to mai us time pe aapko connect kar lunga. But ek chota point bas itna sa hai ki agar aapne kahin pe koi payment miss kiya hai, theek hai, ho sakta hai aapne chota amount kiya ho, bade amount kiya ho.
Customer: Depend karta hai.
Executive: To usme sir mai ye bol raha hu.
Customer: Okay aapki aawaz abhi bahut kat rahi hai aur mai aise ilaake me hu ki network matlab meri aawaz aapko waha pe aa sakti hogi lekin aapki nahi aa rahi hai to hum ek hi kaam karte hai to hum kal se hi shuru kar dete hai, theek hai. To kal aapko call karunga saamne aur fir dekh lenge ya fir aap mujhe reminder call aap karwa dena, theek hai to jab aap message bhi karo na to call hi kar dena, theek hai message mat karna whatsapp pe call hi kar dena aur ek nahi ho to do kar dena, teen mat karna, do call to kar hi dijiyega aap to usse kya hoga ha matlab do call ke andar mai receive kar lunga to mai turant hi matlab laptop pe hota hu mai to IndiaMART ka chalu kar denge, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai okay sir okay kal connect karte hai okay.
Customer: Okay sir paanch se 10 din mai bol raha hu, theek hai aur confirm bol raha hu paanch se 10 din aapko dene hi padenge mere liye, chalega na?
Executive: Koi baat nahi mai de dunga 10 se 10 din de denge koi dikkat nahi hai, kal karte hai connect, theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: Okay sir okay sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to use IndiaMART due to startup work.

- Wants assistance with lead consumption.

- Facing network issues.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to connect daily for assistance.

- Agreed to connect for 10-15 minutes daily.

- Executive asked to clear pending payments.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with executive next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, startup, network issue, payment
